message.body: Hi love!! What's your plan for getting in to town this weekend/when do you arrive? Can't wait to see you!!
Hey! I get in on Saturday morning around 9:30ish
Hot damn gurl! Where are you flying into? Can't wait to seeee you!!
Want to hang out Saturday morning??
Yes please!!! Do you want/need personal transport from the airport? :-)
But if you have plans by all means
I do not! I thought that this weekend was going to involve a Friday night sleepover but apparently that is not the case, so I don't have anything until pole dancing! You said you get in at 930 right?
Yeah! I was going to come Friday but the flights were so so so much cheaper to come early Saturday morning... But I'm all yours all weekend!!!!!!
Yayyyy! Well I should be able to pick you up and we can play! I'll let you know if anything changes but let's plan on that!! â™¥
